mapper.select: SELECT ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiKaisaiNo", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiKaisaiYoteiYMD", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiKaishiYoteiTime", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiShuryoYoteiTime", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiKaisaiYoteiBashoCode", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."gogitaiNo", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiYoteiTeiin", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiSaidaiTeiin", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiJidoWariateTeiin", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiIinTeiin", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiShiryoSakuseiYMD", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."ShinsakaiShinchokuJokyo", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiWariateZumiNinzu", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shiryoSakuseiZumiFlag", ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."mobileDataOutputYMD", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."shinsakaiIinCode", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."kaigoninteiShinsakaiGichoKubunCode", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."shussekiFlag", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."existChikokuFlag", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."shussekiTime", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."existSotaiFlag", ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."taisekiTime" FROM rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" AS ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5503ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho" AS ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho ON ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiKaisaiNo"= ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" WHERE ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} ORDER BY ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho."shinsakaiIinCode"

mapper.select: SELECT T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" , T5511."gogitaiNo" , T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiYMD" , T5511."shinsakaiKaishiTime" , T5511."shinsakaiShuryoTime" , T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiBashoCode" , T5511."shoyoJikanGokei" , T5511."shinsakaiJisshiNinzu" , T5502."shinsakaiOrder" , T5502."hanteiKekkaCode" , T5102."nijiHanteiYMD" , T5102."nijiHanteiYokaigoJotaiKubunCode" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKikan" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoKaishiYMD" , T5102."nijiHanteiNinteiYukoShuryoYMD" , T5102."shinsakaiIken" , T5102."ichijiHanteiKekkaHenkoRiyu" , T5102."yokaigoJotaizoReiCode" , T5102."ninteishinsakaiIkenShurui" , T5102."shinsakaiMemo" , T5102."nijiHanteiKekkaInputHoho" , T5102."nijiHanteiKekkaInputYMD" , T5101."ninteiShinseiHoreiKubunCode" , T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" , T5101."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" , T5101."hihokenshaNo" , T5101."ninteiShinseiYMD" , T5101."ninteiShinseiShinseijiKubunCode" , T5101."hihokenshaName" , T5101."hihokenshaKana" , T5101."seinengappiYMD" , T5101."age" , T5101."seibetsu" , T5101."yubinNo" , T5101."jusho" , T5101."telNo" , T7051."shichosonMeisho" , T5510."ichiGojiHanteiYMD" , T5510."ichiGojiHanteiKekkaCode" , T5510."ichiGojiHanteiKekkaNinchishoKasanCode" , T5510."kijunJikan" , T5510."kijunJikanShokuji" , T5510."kijunJikanHaisetsu" , T5510."kijunJikanIdo" , T5510."kijunJikanSeiketsuHoji" , T5510."kijunJikanKansetsuCare" , T5510."kijunJikanBPSDKanren" , T5510."kijunJikanKinoKunren" , T5510."kijunJikanIryoKanren" , T5510."kijunJikanNinchishoKasan" , T5510."chukanHyokaKomoku1gun" , T5510."chukanHyokaKomoku2gun" , T5510."chukanHyokaKomoku3gun" , T5510."chukanHyokaKomoku4gun" , T5510."chukanHyokaKomoku5gun" , T5510."ichiGojiHnateiKeikokuCode" , T5510."jotaiAnteiseiCode" , T5510."ninchishoJiritsudoIIijoNoGaizensei" , T5510."suiteiKyufuKubunCode" , T5116."ichijiHanteiYMD" , T5116."ichijiHanteiKekkaCode" , T5105."ninteichosaIraiKanryoYMD" , T5202."ninteichosaRirekiNo" , T5202."gaikyoChosaTextImageKubun" , T5202."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" , T5202."ninteichousaIraiKubunCode" , T5202."ninteichosaIraiKaisu" , T5202."updateCount" , T5202."ninteichosaJisshiYMD" , T5202."ninteichosaJuryoYMD" , T5202."ninteiChosaKubunCode" , T5202."chosaItakusakiCode" , T5202."chosainCode" , T5202."chosaJisshiBashoCode" , T5202."chosaJisshiBashoMeisho" , T5202."serviceKubunCode" , T5202."riyoShisetsuShimei" , T5202."riyoShisetsuJusho" , T5202."riyoShisetsuTelNo" , T5202."riyoShisetsuYubinNo" , T5202."tokki" , T5202."tokkijikoUketsukeYMD" , T5202."tokkijikoJuryoYMD" , T5206."jutakuKaishu" , T5206."tokubetsuKyufuService" , T5206."zaitakuService" , T5206."shuso" , T5206."kazokuJokyo" , T5206."kyojuKankyo" , T5206."kikaiKiki" , T5205."ninteichosaTokkijikoNo" , T5205."ninteichosaTokkijikoRemban" , T5205."genponMaskKubun" , T5205."tokkiJiko" , T5207."remban" as サービスの状況連番 , T5207."serviceJokyo" , T5208."remban" as サービスの状況フラグ連番 , T5208."serviceJokyoFlag" , T5209."remban" as 記入項目連番 , T5209."serviceJokyoKinyu" , T5210."remban" as 施設利用連番 , T5210."shisetsuRiyoFlag" , T5203."ninchishoNichijoSeikatsuJiritsudoCode" , T5203."shogaiNichijoSeikatsuJiritsudoCode" , T5211."remban" as 調査項目連番 , T5211."researchItem" , T5115."imageSharedFileId" , T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" , T5101."hihokenshaNo" ,T5913."chosainShimei" FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS T5511 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" AS T5502 ON T5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS T5101 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5502."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5101."logicalDeletedFlag" = false INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS T5201 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5201."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."logicalDeletedFlag" = false INNER JOIN ( SELECT max(DbT5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo") AS 最大履歴番号 , DbT5201."shinseishoKanriNo" FROM rgdb."DbT5201NinteichosaIraiJoho" AS DbT5201 WHERE DbT5201."logicalDeletedFlag" = false GROUP BY DbT5201."shinseishoKanriNo" ) AS 履歴書最大番号 ON 履歴書最大番号."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5201."shinseishoKanriNo" AND 履歴書最大番号."最大履歴番号" = T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT7051KoseiShichosonMaster" AS T7051 ON T7051."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5102NinteiKekkaJoho" AS T5102 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5102."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5510IchiGojiHanteiKekkaJoho" AS T5510 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5510."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5116IchijiHanteiKekkaJoho" AS T5116 ON T5116."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5105NinteiKanryoJoho" AS T5105 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5105."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5202NinteichosahyoGaikyoChosa" AS T5202 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5202."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5202."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5913ChosainJoho" AS T5913 ON T5913."shichosonCode" = T7051."shichosonCode" AND T5913."ninteiChosaItakusakiCode" = T5202."chosaItakusakiCode" AND T5913."ninteiChosainCode" = T5202."chosainCode" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5206GaikyoTokki" AS T5206 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5206."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5206."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5205NinteichosahyoTokkijiko" AS T5205 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5205."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5205."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5207NinteichosahyoServiceJokyo" AS T5207 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5207."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5207."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5208NinteichosahyoServiceJokyoFlag" AS T5208 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5208."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5208."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5209NinteichosahyoKinyuItem" AS T5209 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5209."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5209."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5210NinteichosahyoShisetsuRiyo" AS T5210 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5210."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5210."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5203NinteichosahyoKihonChosa" AS T5203 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5203."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo" = T5203."ninteichosaRirekiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5115Image" AS T5115 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5115."shinseishoKanriNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5211NinteichosahyoChosaItem" AS T5211 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5211."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5201."ninteichosaIraiRirekiNo"= T5211."ninteichosaRirekiNo" WHERE T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{kaisaiBangou} ORDER BY T5502."shinsakaiOrder"

mapper.select: SELECT T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" ,T5101."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" ,T5101."hihokenshaNo" ,T5115."imageSharedFileId" FROM rgdb."DbT5511ShinsakaiKaisaiKekkaJoho" AS T5511 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" AS T5502 ON T5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS T5101 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5502."shinseishoKanriNo" AND T5101."logicalDeletedFlag" = FALSE LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT5115Image" AS T5115 ON T5101."shinseishoKanriNo" = T5115."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE T5511."shinsakaiKaisaiNo"= #{kaisaiBangou}
